MfgProgramCpntFrcstFact.name: MfgProgramCpntFrcstFact
MfgProgramCpntFrcstFact.description: Represents information about the generated manufacturing program component forecast records.

AdjustedForecastedQuantity.description: The adjusted value of the forecasted quantity.

AdjustedForecastedRevenue.description: The adjusted value of the forecasted revenue.

AdvAcctForecastSetUseId.description: The advanced account forecast set context associated with the manufacturing program component forecast fact record.

ExpectedProfitPerUnit.description: The expected profit per unit from the product variant component.

ExpectedProfitPercent.description: The expected profit from the product variant component in percent.

ExternalReferenceNumber.description: The external identifier for the manufacturing program component forecast fact record.

ForecastedQuantity.description: The forecasted quantity of the product variant component that’s calculated by multiplying the forecasted quantity of the associated manufacturing program with the number of component units per product variant unit.

ForecastedRevenue.description: The forecasted revenue from the product variant component.

ManufacturingProgramId.description: The manufacturing program associated with the manufacturing program product variant component forecast fact record.

Name.description: The name of the Manufacturing Program Component Forecast Fact record.

PeriodId.description: The period associated with the manufacturing program product variant component forecast fact record.

PeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the period for which the manufacturing program component forecast fact records are generated.

ProductComponentId.description: The component of the product variant that’s associated with the manufacturing program product variant component forecast fact record.

ProductId.description: The manufacturing program product associated with the manufacturing program product component forecast fact record.

ProductionLocationId.description: The production location of the account.

ProductionModelId.description: The model associated with the manufacturing program component forecast fact record.

SellingPricePerUnit.description: The selling price of a unit of the product variant component.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the manufacturing program product variant component forecast fact record.

TotalCostPerUnit.description: The total cost of a unit of the product variant component that's calculated by adding the total fixed cost per unit and the variable cost per unit.

TotalFixedCostPerUnit.description: The total fixed cost of a unit of the product variant component.

VariableCostPerUnit.description: The variable cost of a unit of the product variant component.
